variable.name: HYBRID_SELECTION_DESIGN
variable.description: Design number of the hybrid selection reagents
variable.value: Design with baits to mtDNA and 1560 nuclear gene loci (coding and 5' UTR exons)
Design with baits to mtDNA and 1605 nuclear gene loci (coding exons only)

variable.name: CLINICAL_DESCRIPTION
variable.description: Description of patient phenotype and clinical history

variable.name: AGE_OF_ONSET
variable.description: Age of onset of symptoms, converted to years (e.g. 1 month => 0.08333 years), rounded to at most three decimal places.

variable.name: AGE_OF_ONSET_UNCERTAIN
variable.description: Flag denoting if the age of onset is uncertain

variable.name: AGE_OF_MITO_DX
variable.description: Age at first biochemical/genetic test for mitochondrial disease. Age from medical record converted to years (e.g. 1 month => 0.08333 years)

variable.name: BERNIER_CRITERIA
variable.description: Status of OXPHOS disease diagnosis based on Bernier diagnostic criteria

variable.name: MORAVA_SCORE
variable.description: Score of OXPHOS disease diagnosis based on Morava diagnostic criteria

variable.name: FAMILY_HISTORY
variable.description: First-degree relative with phenotype highly similar to proband
variable.value: Patient has mother with similar symptoms; or patient is female with an affected child.
Patient has sibling with similar symptoms
